description: A cpClientAuthenticationFailure trap signifies that the SNMP entity,
acting in an agent role, has detected a client authentication failure.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpClientAuthenticationFailure EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientMacAddress s EXAMPL EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientCPID i 9999 EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientAssocIfIndex i 9999 EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientSwitchMacAddress s EXAMPL EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientUserName s EXAMPLE

description: The MAC address of the workstation from which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientMacAddress

description: The IP address of the workstation from which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientIpAddress

description: The captive portal instance on which the client was authenticated.
variables.name: EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientCPID

description: The interface on which the client was authenticated.
variables.name: EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientAssocIfIndex

description: The MAC address of the switch to which the client is authenticated.
variables.name: EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientSwitchMacAddress

description: User name (or Guest ID) of the connected client.
variables.name: EdgeSwitch-CAPTIVE-PORTAL-MIB::cpCaptivePortalClientUserName

acting in an agent role, has detected a client connection.

acting in an agent role, has detected a client disconnection.
